      • newIncrementingFile

        public static void newIncrementingFile(Board board,
                                       SilkBag silkBag)
        Saves the game data to an incremented file.
        Parameters:
        silkBag - The silk bag to save.
        board - The board to save.

      • formatBoard

        public static void formatBoard(Board board,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Player> arrayList,
                               java.lang.String fileName)
        Turns the board into a savable format.
        Parameters:
        board - The board to save.
        arrayList - The profiles playing on the board to save.
        fileName - The file name of the board.

      • WriteToFile

        public static void WriteToFile(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> aList,
                               java.lang.String namingFile)
        Writes the given data to the save file. Will save to data persistence file or incremented file depending on how its called.
        Parameters:
        aList - The list of data.
        namingFile - The name of the file to write to.

      • getBoardData

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getBoardData(java.lang.String fileName)
        Gets the board data in file to be used when instantiating a board.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the save file.
        Returns:
        The board data.
